inventory.name: Nails
inventory.description: Steel nails for general construction.

inventory.name: Hammers
inventory.description: 16 oz claw hammer with wooden handle.

inventory.name: Bolt Cutters
inventory.description: Bolt Cutter is used for cutting chains, padlocks, bolts, fences and wire mesh. It is an ideal tool for any home owner, and perfect for DIY projects and construction use.

inventory.name: 3 piece Plier Set
inventory.description: The Classic 3-piece Plier Set is the perfect addition to the home handyman's toolbox.This set contains: Combi Plier for holding, gripping, bending, and cutting work.Side Cutters with a precision cutting edge for the finest wires.Long Nose Pliers for cutting hard and soft wires.

inventory.name: Hand Saws
inventory.description: 360mm Toolbox Handsaw is an ideal general purpose Handsaw that is suitable for a wide variety of woodworking projects and cutting all types of timber.

inventory.name: Staple Gun
inventory.description: High durability, all steel stapling gun meeting high demand from professional users.

inventory.name: Screwdrivers
inventory.description: Set of 6 screwdrivers, various sizes.

inventory.name: Drills
inventory.description: Cordless drill with battery and charger.

inventory.name: Grinders
inventory.description: Complete a wide variety of cutting, grinding, shaping and polishing jobs

inventory.name: Biscuit Joiners
inventory.description: Biscuit Joiner for fast and convenient cutting and joining of timber. Especially helpful when edge joining long boards of either natural wood or manufactured sheeting.

inventory.name: Circular Saw
inventory.description: This saw has a more powerful motor and gearing compared to its previous model which improves its performance to allow for deeper cuts of up the 52mm.

inventory.name: Corded Multi Tool
inventory.description: This 220W Multi Function Tool is useful for a variety of jobs around the house. Cut wood, plastic or plaster board with the included cutting blade.

inventory.name: Plywood
inventory.description: 4x8 feet plywood sheets.

inventory.name: Cemplaster
inventory.description: Cemplaster is an exterior use plaster used for block and brick work, and concrete substrates, in civil, commercial, industrial and residential applications.

inventory.name: Waterproofing Membranes
inventory.description: This Exterior Grade Brushable Waterproofer is a synthetic rubber waterproofing membrane for use in areas of high expected movement, ponding or permanent immersion.

inventory.name: Liquid Nails Original Construction Adhesive
inventory.description: Liquid Nails is a premium grade multi-purpose construction adhesive that delivers a consistently strong and lasting bond on most building materials to cope with shrinkage and thermal movement.

inventory.name: Anti Slip Tape
inventory.description: Durable and chemical and oil resistant, this black anti-slip tape reduces the risk of slips, trips and falls in high traffic areas and is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

inventory.name: Fibre Cement Cladding 2700 x 600 x 19mm Durafloor
inventory.description: Fibre cement is superb for interior wet areas such as bathrooms and laundries. You can also specify Durafloorâ„¢ for a variety of exterior uses.

inventory.name: Timber Cladding
inventory.description: Manufactured from Finger Jointed Clear Radiata Pine. Kiln Dried to a target Moisture content of 10 - 14 %. Coated with a factory applied oil based architectural primer.

inventory.name: Demi Round 40 Pre-Primed MDF Panel 2400 x 1200 x 12mm
inventory.description: Panels feature a convenient tongue and groove system for fast and easy installation and are pre-primed ready for your choice of paint colour.

inventory.name: Plain Particle Board 16 x 2440 x 1220mm
inventory.description: Superfine Particleboard is a three layered board, with fine particles on the top and bottom surfaces, and larger wood flakes in the middle.

inventory.name: Compressed Fibre Cement 2400 x 600 x 4.5mm Lining
inventory.description: Compressed Fibre Cement Lining sheets have an unsanded finish suitable for semi-gloss acrylics or lightly textured semigloss or high-gloss coatings. Perfect economical option for all eaves, verandahs, porches and carports.

inventory.name: Magnetic Door Stops
inventory.description: high quality and stylish magnetic doorstops. The magnetic doorstops use built in spring buffer device in the small round section, which plays a role in shock absorption and minimizing noises when the door stop catches the moving door.

inventory.name: Door Hinges
inventory.description: This hinge has a fixed pin for extra home security.The hinge is supplied prime coated making it ready for painting once installed.

inventory.name: Black Entrance Knob Set
inventory.description: Entrance Knob Set features a quality matte black finish, adjustable back set and is easy to install. This kit is backed by a 3 year warranty.

inventory.name: Internal Concertina Doors
inventory.description: PVC doors are perfect for closing-off rooms for privacy, concealing unsightly areas, or for creating divisions within rooms and other large areas.

inventory.name: External Entrance Door
inventory.description: A great way to give a new look to your entrance with this Miacador Frosted Glass door, with its stylish tempered frosted glass that boasts light and privacy.
